description:
Part shirt dress, part smock, part warm weather trench. No matter how you wear the High Coast shade dress, you will be able to makes its style, your own. With a loose, relaxed fit, and a breathable organic cotton blend, this dress helps keep you comfy when the temperature rises.

  • Organic cotton and recycled polyester blend wears well, dries quickly, and keeps its environmental footprint small
  • G-1000® Air Stretch material has a rip-stop weave for improved durability
  • Button-up placket can be worn buttoned on its own as a dress, or unbuttoned as a trench
  • ¾ sleeves can be rolled easily
  • Dual hand pockets and single zippered chest pocket
  • Back length is 103cm
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort
name: Fjallraven High Coast Shade Dress - Women's
